archimate:Requirement.name: IR.1.2.4b: b) key individuals have been notified ahead of time and that their involvement has been clearly defined and agreed (e.g. information owners need to attend a business impact assessment workshop and will be required to approve decisions on the potential impact of a security incident)
archimate:Requirement.documentation: This is a standard topic modelled from the 2022 Version of the Standards Of Good Practice by ISF. It has been adopted as version 3 of the Security Baseline.
